positionInfo: This card represents the subject, topic or question for the reading. Use it to help define the issue clearly.
Generally indicates events or attitudes that have lead to the present situation or question. Helpful for further insight into the issue.
Influence on the Qu of the person receiving the reading, e.g. how he/she/they has responded so far or reacted emotionally. Hopes, expectaions, fears...
The influence of the outside world or outside forces. May be interpreted in terms of other people, friends, family, boss, etc..
Tarot's answer for this situation or question. Some take it as suggested actions, other as how to respond mentally or emotionally. Interpretation is key.
